Note: J (current density) is not a material, but a property or parameter associated with the supercapacitor. Therefore, it should not be included in the table as a material name.

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: 30 Hence , the PCE improved with an increase in J SC .

Let's think step by step.

| Property Value |
| --- |
| PCE improved |
| with an increase |
| in J SC |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Value of material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Value |
| --- |
| PCE improved |
| with an increase |
| in J SC |

Note: PCE stands for Producer Price Index, which is a measure of the average change in selling prices received by domestic producers for their output. J SC may refer to the Japan Smaller Trade Price Index, which measures the changes in selling prices of goods and services produced by small and medium-sized enterprises in Japan. Both PCE and J SC are economic indicators that represent values.
